title: Bug 25073[ViewMgmt] Closing stacked view shows view placeholder (empty view)
description: build 20021017MAke sure the tasks view is open and visible in the lower right pane, stackedtogether with the console view and the search view underneath.Restart the workbenchClose the task viewThere will be an empty pane with the console view title. If you click on thepane the actual console view is shown.There are other ways to reproduce this effect but this is the easiest one.
